Throughout the year, observe children &: Ebudeni bonyaka, bahlolisise abantwana uze ulugcine uhlolisiso lwakho
Let's pretend you're tracking progress f: Masithi ngokomzekelo wenza uhlolisiso lomntwana ogama linguThemba. Ukuqalisa cofa apha!
Pretend that, while observing Temba, you: Masithi njengoko ubuvavanya uThemba, uqaphela ukuba unoncumo.Cofa u“Ewe” ukuphendula!
Great!\n\n If you are not sure if Temba: Kakhulu! Ukuba akuqinisekanga ukuba ikhona into uThemba anokuyenza  khetha  u-“Andazi”
Some questions have pictures attached.\n:
Eminye imibuzo ihamba nemifanekiso

Cofa apha ukubona umfanekiso
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Cofa uvala ukufihla umfanekiso wesilandeli - nkqubela.
You can always leave the progress tracke: Akunyanzelekanga umvale umlandeli wenkqubela ungaphinda ubuyele kuye uze ugqibezele. Cofa apha
When you have answered all the questions: Xa sele uyiphendule yonke imibuzo, ungayenza nengxelo yomkhathaleli okanye ujonge iimpendulo zakho kwakhona.
You can see all of your completed report: Ungakwazi ukuzibona zonke iingxelo zakho ezigqityiweyo xa ubuyela kwikhasi leengxelo
